about.description:
A Sphinx extension that converts any documentation or personal website
project into a full-fledged blog.

name: ablog
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "ablog" %}
{% set version = "0.9.5" %}
{% set sha256 = "54e0d61e58dd8fcf8a5102cb4ae0ef6374f966fe95e50330bfab412a51d09afd" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: python -m pip install --no-deps --ignore-installed .
  entry_points:
    - ablog = ablog.commands:ablog_main

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - pip
  run:
    - python
    - werkzeug
    - sphinx >=1.6
    - alabaster
    - invoke
    - python-dateutil
    - sphinx-automodapi

test:
  requires:
    - git
    - nbsphinx
  commands:
    - ablog --version
    - git clone --depth 1 --branch v{{ version }} https://github.com/sunpy/ablog
    - cd ablog/docs
    - ablog build -T
    - ablog build -b latex -T -d .doctrees -w _latex
    - ablog build -T -b json
    - ablog build -T -b pickle

about:
  home: https://github.com/sunpy/ablog
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  summary: 'ABlog for blogging with Sphinx'
  description: |
    A Sphinx extension that converts any documentation or personal website
    project into a full-fledged blog.
  doc_url: http://ablog.readthedocs.org
  dev_url: https://github.com/sunpy/ablog

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - nabobalis
    - rgrinberg
